overview: “Sandeep Singhal is a Managing Director with Sequoia Capital India. Prior to joining Sequoia Capital India, Sandeep was with WestBridge Capital Partners. Earlier, Sandeep worked at BCG, where he advised several mid-market Indian companies on their product and marketing strategies. Prior to BCG, Sandeep worked with Hindustan Lever Limited (â€œHLLâ€), where he was instrumental in eleven product launches targeting Indian consumer segments that have provided significant contribution to the company’s business. Sandeep serves on the board of the Internet and Mobile Association of India (IAMAI). Sandeep received an MBA with distinction from IIM Ahmedabad, an MS in molecular simulation from the University of Illinois, and a B. Tech. in Chemical Engineering from IIT Delhi.” (Source: Sequoia Capital)
